summary:
This mod adds a merchant and trainer called Xenia to most of the inns of Skyrim. She has a lot of money (30,000 gold coins) and is also a master trainer.
It also adds Bjorn, a merchant that sells all the skill books, alchemy ingredients and metal ingots available in game.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=yellow]
[size=3]---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
You can not use my assets in any mods/files that are being sold, for money, on Steam Workshop or other platforms
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size]
[/color][/center]

Name: Ashara's Merchants and Trainers
Version: 3.0
Date: 04-04-2013
Category: Mercantiles
Requirements: latest official Skyrim patch plus all 3 official DLCs
Author(s): Ashara
Source:
* Nexus: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28996
* Steam: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=116394609

[center][size=14][color=yellow]Description
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
This mod adds two merchants and trainers called Xenia and Bjorn.

Xenia
-------
You can find Xenia in most of the inns of Skyrim and at the Inn at Raven Rock. She has a lot of money (30,000 gold coins) and is also a master trainer. She doesn't sell anything.
Xenia offers the following training services:
1.- Sneak - Windhelm
2.- Destruction - Whiterun
3.- Pickpocket - Solitude
4.- One handed - Riften
5.- Light Armour - Markarth
6.- Enchanting - Morthal
7.- Two handed - Dawnstar
8.- Conjuration - Falkreath
9.- Illusion - Riverwood
10.- Restoration - Rorikstead
11.- Alchemy - Dragon Bridge
12.- Archery - Winterhold
13.- Heavy armour - Ivarstead
14.- Block - Kynesgrove
15.- Alteration - Old Hroldan Inn
16.- Lockpicking - Nightgate Inn
17.- Only buys items - Retching Netch (Raven Rock)


Bjorn
-------
You can find Bjorn in the inns of the five main cities (Markarth, Riften, Solitude, Whiterun and Windhelm) and at the Inn at Raven Rock. He sells all the skill books, alchemy ingredients and metal ingots available in game and also all the ingredients available in all three DLCs (Hearthfire, Dawguard and Dragonborn).
Bjorn offers the following training services:
17.- Smithing - Solitude
18.- Speech - Windhelm

Be warned that Skyrim merchants buy/sell options break if they have more than 30,000 gold coins. So, if you buy lots of things from Bjorn an he ends up having more than 30,000 gold coins, you won't be able of selling him anything (actually, you'd be able to sell them but you won't receive any gold for the items you sold). If you want to buy and sell from him, sell the items to him before he reaches the 30,000 gold limit.
This Skyrim bug doesn't apply to training services, i.e., if you buy training services from Xenia and she ends up with more than 30,000 gold coins, you can still sell any items to her without problems: it seems the game handles differently the gold they receive from training services than the gold they receive from bought items.

[size=14][color=yellow]Required mods
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
For the main version, all 3 official DLCs:
* Hearthfire
* Dawnguard
* Dragonborn

There is an older version, under the optional files caetgories, that only requires Skyrim (no DLC).

[size=14][color=yellow]Mods used in pictures
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
If you want to Xenia and Bjorn as shown in the pictures, these are the mods I use:
* BellaGail's "Better Females by Bella": http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812 (less make up version 2)
* Chris57's "Better males" (file "Faces - YoungerFacesMergedWithMenByGeonox" : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488
* Navetsea's "Straight hair retexture" : http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4333
* Aluminumfoil's "Eyebrows Match Hair": http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=627
* Ran's "RANs HeadMesh Variants":http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7127 (RANs type-A headmesh)
* LogRaam's "The Eyes of Beauty": http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722 (Player)
* Zzjay's "Better Females By Bella Natural Edition ": http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26113 (Less makeup version)
* HumanNature66's "HN66s Long Eye Lashes": http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27783
* mrLenski's "Coverwomen": http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563 /(only the new lips tintmask, nothing else)

[size=14][color=yellow]Install
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
Install using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
-------------------------------------
1. Download the file
2. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the "Activates the selected mod" button.
When asked if you want to overwrite existing files say "Yes to all".

Manual install
------------------
1. Extract the files of this mod to a temporary location (you can use 7zip: http://www.7-zip.org, to unzip them) and chek the folder structure.
2. Copy to (My documents folder) My GamesSkyrimData:
.- the esp file
.- the meshes folder
.- the textures folder
If asked if you want to overwrite existing files say "Yes to all".
3. In Skyrim launcher select "Data Files" and activate AsharaMerchants.esp

[size=14][color=yellow]Uninstall
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
Uninstall using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
-------------------------------------
1. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the "Deactivates the selected mod" button.

Manual uninstall
----------------
1. In Skyrim Launcher select "Data Files" and deactivate the AsharaMerchants.esp file.
2. Delete
.- the file DataAsharaMerchant.esp
.- the folder meshesactorscharacterFaceGenDataFaceGeomAsharaMerchants.esp and its contents
.- the folder texturesactorscharacterfacegendatafacetintAsharaMerchants.esp and its contents
.- the files whose name begins by ASH_ in the folders:
.- Scripts
.- ScriptsSource

[size=14][color=yellow]Incompatibility
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
None that I am aware of. If you find anything, please tell me.

[size=14][color=yellow]Known issues or bugs
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
Be warned that Skyrim merchants buy/sell options break if they have more than 30,000 gold coins. So, if you buy lots of things from Bjorn an he ends up having more than 30,000 gold coins, you won't be able of selling him anything (actually, you'd be able to sell them but you won't receive any gold for the items you sold). If you want to buy and sell from him, sell the items to him before he reaches the 30,000 gold limit.
This Skyrim bug doesn't apply to training services, i.e., if you buy training services from Xenia and she ends up with more than 30,000 gold coins, you can still sell any items to her without problems: it seems the game handles differently the gold they receive from training services than the gold they receive from bought items.

[size=14][color=yellow]Tutorials
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
* [url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php?title=Adding_a_Merchant_NPC_to_Skyrim]Adding a Merchant NPC to Skyrim[/url]
* [url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php?title=Adding_a_Trainer_NPC_to_Skyrim]Adding a Trainer NPC to Skyrim[/url]
* [url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php?title=User:SydneyB]Other Tutorials[/url]

[size=14][color=yellow]History
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
3.0, 04-04-2013 - Added a new version that adds all Dragonborn ingredients to Bjorn and also places Xenia and Bjorn at the inn at Raven Rock.
2.3, 07-01-2013 - Added an optional file that adds all Herthfire and Dawnguard ingredients to Bjorn.
2.3, 06-12-2013 - A present from the Three Kings: fixed the training dialogue, now all training dilogue work fine. Added also dialogue to Xenia and Bjorn when your skill is at 100 or higher and cannot be trained further.
2.2, 05-01-2013 - Xenia and Bjorn can train you up to level 100.
2.1, 02-01-2013 - Included the dialogue files.
2.0, 30-12-2012 - Added Bjorn, a new merchant that sells skill books, alchemy ingredients and metal ingots. Xenia doesn't sell anyhting anymore. Added voices to the training dialogue.
1.0, 27-12-2012 - Initial release.

[size=14][color=yellow]Contact
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
You can contact me leaving a comment at the file's thread, sending me a PM or leaving a comment at the mod's thread.

You can find me on Nexus as SydneyB: http://www.tesnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=259193.
You can find me on the Bethesda official forums as Ashara: http://www.bethsoft.com/bgsforums/index.php?showuser=364891.
You can find me on Clan Dlan as Ashara: http://www.clandlan.net/foros/index.php?showuser=6932.

[size=14][color=yellow]Credits
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to Phnx at Tesadventures for the tutorial on how to import your character's face into the CK: http://tesadventures.com/forum/index.php?topic=4082.0
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on: http://hammondslegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp
Thanks to Nexus for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to all the modding community for all their tutorials, tools and help. Especially, thanks to the Clan Dlan, TesAdventures, Bethesda Official Forum and the Nexus communities.

[size=14][color=yellow]Tools used
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
Construction Kit (available on Steam)
7zip - http://www.7-zip.org/
Readme Generator - http://lhammonds.game-host.org/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

[size=14][color=yellow]Permissions
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
You can reuse this mod into your own mod but all I ask in return is that you give me credit if you distribute them.

[size=14][color=yellow]My Skyrim mods
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]

files.name: Ashara Merchants and Trainers v23
files.changelogHtml:
06-12-2013 - A present from the Three Kings: fixed the training dialogue, now all training dilogue work fine. Added also dialogue to Xenia and Bjorn when your skill is at 100 or higher and cannot be trained further.
07-01-2013 - Added an optional file that adds all Hearthfire and Dwanguard ingredients to Bjorn. It requires the main mod file v2.3 plus both DLCs
17-03-2013 - added a compatibility patch for Realistic teeth.
